changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS invoices ( id bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('invoices_id_seq'), invoice_number VARCHAR (25) NOT NULL, user_id bigint NOT NULL, product_id bigint NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL, buy_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT invoice_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id), FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product (id) );
